Node.definition: = man; ◄ son of Omri (עָמְרִי) ► king of northern kingdom of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) husband of Jezebel (אִיזֶבֶל) father of Ahaziah (אֲחַזְיָהוּ) and Joram (יְהֹורָם)
= woman; ◄ daughter of Ethbaal (אֶתְבַּעַל) king of Sidon (צִידֹון) ► wife of king Ahab (אַחְאָב)

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= male person speaking on behalf of a deity

= causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task
= woman; ◄ daughter of Ethbaal (אֶתְבַּעַל) king of Sidon (צִידֹון) ► wife of king Ahab (אַחְאָב)
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
plural with plural meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
literally: in accordance to the time of tomorrow; hence: = a reference to the time exactly 24 hours after a particular event takes place
= a reference to the day after the current day
= causative action by which humans or deities make objects or (other) humans different from what they were before

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
literally: to go to (one's) life; hence: = action by which humans move away from a certain place in order to save their life from danger

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood

m.definition: = town; ◄ located in the Negeb (נֶגֶב) at the southern border of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► used esp. in combination with Dan (דָּן) at the northern border of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) to refer to all Israel

Node.definition: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
literally: road; hence: = the space between two places

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= action by which humans assume a sitting position in a certain location and remain in that position for some time; ≈ sometimes associated with a certain status, role, or common activity

= a tough desert shrub, up to 2 m tall, with many small branches, few leaves, and clusters of white flowers; ◄ Retama raetam; ► provides some shade in the desert, and its roots contain oil and so make a very hot fire
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= process by which humans or animals stop living, either spontaneously or as a result of an act of aggression

Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= state in which a certain event has progressed long enough for it to be able to stop
= a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

literally: throat, as the part of the body that contains the passage ways for blood, air, and food; hence: = the life principle that animates both humans and animals, turns them into breathing living beings, and functions as the center of their personality, mind, physical and non physical desires, courage, emotions, and affections; it is believed to reside in the blood
= state in which humans and deities have character, integrity, and good fortune
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= indirect male progenitor

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= state in which humans are asleep; ≈ sometimes associated with security, sometimes with death, sometimes with being inactive

= a tough desert shrub, up to 2 m tall, with many small branches, few leaves, and clusters of white flowers; ◄ Retama raetam; ► provides some shade in the desert, and its roots contain oil and so make a very hot fire
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else
= process or action by which the hand or another part of the body of humans gets in brief contact with an object, either or not deliberately

= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= the place where one lays the head when sleeping
= container, ◄ made from earthenware, ► used for storing liquids
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

= a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range

literally: road; hence: = the space between two places

= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth
= referent to a female person or another object that is considered feminine
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark
= state in which a countable entity is forty in number
= the time of day that is characterized by darkness; ≈ associated with sleep, fear, evil, and hardship
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth

= a mountain, also known as the mountain of God; ◄ it is located on the Sinai (סִינַי) peninsula, ► and known as the place where God appeared to Moses (מֹשֶׁה) and where later the law was given to Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) on their way to the promised land
= a large open place on the side of a rock or mountain, ► used for burying and hiding, or as a temporary dwelling place
= action when people or objects stay overnight in a certain place
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= action by which humans or deities suspend their commitment to a certain pattern of behavior

= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= construction with a flat top, ◄ originally made out of stones that were not cut and shaped with tools, later also out of metal; ► used for burning sacrifices

Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) son of Nimshi (נִמְשִׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) (c. 841 814)
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
= man; ◄ son of Jehoshaphat (יְהֹושָׁפָט) son of Nimshi (נִמְשִׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) (c. 841 814)

Node.gloss: to cause to die|to kill|to put to death
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans, animals, or deities cause (other) humans or animals to stop living
= man; ► son of Shaphat (שָׁפָט) from Abel Meholah (אָבֵל מְחֹולָה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
= state in which a countable entity is seven in number
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= central area of the leg where the thigh is joined to the lower leg; ≈ associated with stability and strength
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
literally: to go down on (one's) knees; hence: = action by which humans kneel down in order to show respect
= male deity; ► worshiped by Canaanites (כְּנַעֲנִי) ≈ regarded as the possessor of a certain location
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= process by which humans or objects come upon (other) humans or objects without searching

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ► son of Shaphat (שָׁפָט) from Abel Meholah (אָבֵל מְחֹולָה) ► prophet (נָבִיא)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ from Abel Mehola (אָבֵל מְחֹולָה) ► father of prophet (נָבִיא) Elisha (אֱלִישָׁע)
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine

= causative action by which someone breaks the soil with the help of a plow, pulled by domestic animals; ► to make it ready for cultivation; ≈ usually regarded as a strenuous task which requires much energy
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= a pair of animals, ◄ such as donkeys or oxen, ► tied or yoked together for a common task, plowing or transportation of goods
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= man; ◄ from Tishbe (תִּשְׁבִּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of Ahab (אַחְאָב)
= garment ► worn on top of one's other clothes, especially outdoor
= action by which humans or deities move away from an object, person, or place

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ from Tishbe (תִּשְׁבִּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of Ahab (אַחְאָב)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= action with which a person touches her or his lips to another person (usually on the lips or cheek or hand) or to an object ► to show love or respect or devotion; also used when greeting and saying goodbye
= direct male progenitor; ► who normally provides protection, care, instruction, and discipline; ≈ is usually regarded with respect and associated with wisdom, security, and comfort
= direct female progenitor; ≈ associated with affection and loyalty; often extended figuratively to refer to other objects that are regarded as feminine
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified

Node.gloss: to do|to perform|to commit|to practice|to observe|to celebrate|to keep
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities engage in a particular action
literally: to turn; hence: = action by which animals, humans, or deities move back to a location where they have been before
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= a pair of animals, ◄ such as donkeys or oxen, ► tied or yoked together for a common task, plowing or transportation of goods

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= causative action by which humans kill one or more animals, usually for food
= human made object of any kind, usually specified by the context, ◄ of various makings ► and made for various purposes

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= causative process by which humans prepare food for consumption by immersing it in boiling water for a prolonged period
= the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination
= particle linking two elements and indicating that X is located or takes place behind Y
= man; ◄ from Tishbe (תִּשְׁבִּי) ► prophet (נָבִיא) time of Ahab (אַחְאָב)
